description:
Create the info tab page for FO-01.

File: app/fo-01/info/page.tsx

Content:
- Version: FO-01
- Name: Full Onboarding
- Description: Complete warm onboarding flow with AI-generated affirmations
- Key features:
  - 10-step onboarding journey
  - Open text intention capture (like AP-01)
  - 100 AI-generated affirmations
  - Swipe-based selection (up/down)
  - AP-01 quality guidelines for stunning affirmations
- Based on: AP-01's affirmation quality guidelines, AP-02's swipe mechanics, FP-01's topic inspiration

Follow pattern from other info pages (e.g., app/ag-good-ten/info/page.tsx)
